title: Amser Bath Albi
content: Dydy Albi ddim yn hoffi mynd i'r bath tan iddo gael antur anghyffredin iawn. Albi who does not like baths, until he has an unusual adventure.
contentSnippet: Dydy Albi ddim yn hoffi mynd i'r bath tan iddo gael antur anghyffredin iawn. Albi who does not like baths, until he has an unusual adventure.
